arts.ttl: What Jeremy Doku said just two weeks ago is now very interesting in wake of his masterclass vs Napoli
How Foden & Doku magic unlocked 10-man Napoli's low block
arts.sum: BBC Sport pundits Nedum Onouha, Nicky Bandini and Nicky Butt look at how Manchester City adjusted the way they played to beat the low block of 10-man Napoli.

arts.ttl: Pep confident Haaland can beat CL goals record after scoring 50th vs Napoli
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola confident Erling Haaland can beat Champions League scoring record after netting his 50th against Napoli.

arts.ttl: 'Stunning': Italian media say £55m Manchester City star was absolutely 'unstoppable' against Napoli
arts.sum: He is in the form of his life!

arts.sum: Pep Guardiola was impressed with the ‘extraordinary’ defensive performance of 10-man Napoli, while it would’ve...

arts.ttl: Man City ease to victory over 10-man Napoli
arts.sum: Manchester City produced a dominant performance to win 2-0 against 10-man Napoli in their Champions League opener at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: Man City: Antonio Conte explains early Kevin De Bruyne substitution as star's return ended prematurely
arts.sum: Belgian started from the off on his return to the Etihad Stadium

arts.ttl: Foden: ‘Napoli a nightmare to break down, De Bruyne forever a legend’
arts.sum: Phil Foden hails ‘forever legend’ Kevin De Bruyne on his brief return to Manchester City,...

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland strikes again as Man City attackers score 8/10 in comfortable Napoli win
arts.sum: MANCHESTER CITY 2-0 NAPOLI: Erling Haaland and Jeremy Doku scored in the second half to ensure Pep Guardiola's men made the perfect start to their Champions League campaign

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne’s Man City return lasts only 26 minutes due to Napoli red card
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne’s Manchester City return was cut short Thursday when the Napoli midfielder was substituted after only 26 minutes following a red card for teammate Giovanni Di Lorenzo. Di Lorenzo was sent off in the 21st minute following a VAR review for bringing down Erling Haaland just outside the box.
